channel.title: life on ChenXin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in life on ChenXin's Blog

item.title: /ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ\ DuoDuo /ᐠ–ꞈ–ᐟ\
item.description: DuoDuo is a very cute kitty, he is my partner, my all tenderness, and the fluffy dream in my life!

item.title: About
item.description: This is ChenXin, a guy doesn’t like to post moments in WeChat, welcome to my blog! You may confuse that the word nixnehc in URLs of this blog, I just left an easter egg here, and I’ll reveal the answer in the end of this page. INFJ-A (I called that ‘16-Personality Religion’ which Yuqian「昱倩」introduced it to me) 一种浅显的批评：自我标签化是无能的人类让自己从人群中脱颖而出的简单技巧。这也是我为啥称之为「十六人格宗教」 I’m extremely loyal to my family! I have long hair but short wit.
